title: Reuters reveals senior Indonesian officials targeted by spyware last year
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively revealed more than a dozen senior Indonesian government and military officials were targeted last year with spy software […]

The post Reuters reveals senior Indonesian officials targeted by spyware last year appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively revealed more than a dozen senior Indonesian government and military officials were targeted last year with spy software designed by an Israeli surveillance firm. The targets included Chief Economic Minister Airlangga Hartarto, senior military personnel, two regional diplomats, and advisers in Indonesia’s defence and foreign affairs ministries.Â 

The post Reuters reveals senior Indonesian officials targeted by spyware last year appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
